snippet: Guided by the gentle instruction of Shiro Oishi, several generations of New Yorkers practice the Japanese martial art of judo at the Oishi Judo club in Lower Manhattan.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Oishi Judo club in Lower Manhattan, where several generations of New Yorkers practice the Japanese martial art.
lead_paragraph: Guided by the gentle instruction of Shiro Oishi, several generations of New Yorkers practice the Japanese martial art of judo at the Oishi Judo club in Lower Manhattan.
